idea: Are you unsure about how the right food can help reach your health goals?For over 8 years PKHK has been creating tailormade meals for thousands of conscious, aware people who see food as a remedy for a better life. Poonam, a Food technologist and Nutritionist, and her team listen to and understand the unique needs of people. They scientifically design and also deliver personalised meals and beverages to suit different lifestyles and preferences. Meals that are healthy, nutritious and finger licking delicious too!
name: Grishma Health Foods Pvt Ltd

idea: Our company works on the module of converting a traditional dry fodder or feed grade agri-waste again into nutritive green fodder/feed loaded with wet algae biomass rich bio-nutritionals through fast growing algae the Chlorella or Spirulina or the Green forms of algae Dunaliella or Tetraselmis. These Algae will be cultivated in brackish, saline waters of Sambhar lake or in underground water at sunlit algal ponds or in Photobioreactors & Green house.
name: SABRAN BIOENTTRI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Nikole Kozmetics are known for offering the best range of Skin and Hair Care Products. Our company is located in Shirpur, Maharashtra (India) from where we supply the items to our clients all across the nation. All the manufactured products such as Aloe Vera Gel, Baby Hair Oil, Baby Massage Oil, Cream, Lotion, Facial Kit, Face Wash, Hand Wash etc. are loved for the quick results they help to get. People who use our products cant stop raving about them and later no other brands meet their expectations. As a customer-centric organization, we support our customers in many ways from offering them best quality cosmetic products to helping them in the development of their product range.
name: NIKOLE KOZMETICS PRIVATE LIMITED
